episode.title: DevSpeak #28 | Behind barriers and solutions proposed by micro-services
episode.members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Le√£o, Wesley Williams and Lucas Santos
episode.description:
Developers Wesley Willians and Lucas Santos were invited to this Faladev to have a conversation about what are microservices and what are the challenges and barriers to their application.

In this edition, Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista guide the conversation raising relevant topics and questions about the subject.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together tech professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

The DevSpeak is an original Rocketseat podcast.

#programming #rocketseat #programmer

Audio in Brazilian Portuguese.
